h1.span: Breaking News: Week 5 of COVID-19 Closure

strong.em: Don't miss another issue of Breaking News! Click here to subscribe for an email each time a new issue is posted!

span.p: Here is your latest issue of Breaking News—the e-newsletter of the Gateway Regional School District—for the 2019-20 school year. We will be sending out special editions of Breaking News to summarize the week's changes surrounding the closure of the district due to health concerns around COVID-19 & the novel coronavirus. Visit this Special Info page of the GRSD website for regular updates, health information, and letters to parents/guardians. And for a quick one-page summary, check out our "Summary of the Week: Week 5" here.

p.strong: QUOTE OF THE WEEK: “You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I lived through this, I can take the next thing that comes along.' ”

span.p: APRIL BREAK: April 20 - April 24 is still scheduled April Break. There will be no remote enrichment work or meal pickups.
MS/HS 3rd QUARTER GRADES: Parents/guardians can log in to PowerSchool Parent Portal to view.
SUPERINTENDENT'S CORNER: Dr. Hopson discusses the cancellation of MCAS for the year, other testing logistics, and potential budget and planning considerations around COVID-19.
MS MEMORY BOOK: The Middle School Memory Books are available to order, and they'd also appreciate photo submissions from folks from the last few weeks working from home.
SCHOOL BASED HEALTH CENTER & GATOR GRINS: Medical, dental, behavioral health, and optometry services available.
DISCLAIMER FOR VIRTUAL LIVE LESSONS & MEETINGS: Outlines privacy and security policies around remote learning and virtual meetings.

SCHOOL ADJUSTMENT COUNSELORS AVAILABLE: Gateway Adjustment Counselors are available to help students with various challenges around the new remote educational enrichment environment and learning at home. MS/HS Website or Elementary Website

SEND US YOUR PHOTOS! YES EVEN NOW!: Check out our new "Gateway Works from Home" photo gallery here. How are things going? Are you working from home? Has your family come up with any creative activities? Have you seen anything interesting on a walk recently? What are your family and friends doing to support each other? Send any photos of what you're up to! photos@grsd.org We'll post our favorites to Gateway social media & website. Let's stay connected!
ONLINE RESOURCES & ACTIVITIES: During this time when many organizations and activities are closed or cancelled, there are a lot of really great online resources to keep kids busy and engaged.

ul.li: PBS Parent Page: Lots of helpful fun ideas for educational activities
Blandford Porter Memorial Library: live online storytime, digital ebooks, and more
Cosmic Kids: Free online fitness classes for kids, ranging from 1 minute to 1 hour
Down Dog Yoga: Free app download & free access for all K-12 teachers & students through July 1st
Milk Street Cooking School: Free online classes available through April 30
PBS Kids Online: Great free educational games and fun creative activity ideas for kids and families

span.p: GATEWAY'S MOBILE APP AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD ON GOOGLE PLAY & APP STORE
